price: Na walio kufuru na kuzikanusha Ishara zetu, basi hao watapata adhabu ya kufedhehesha.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ
footnotes: Na walio kufuru na wakazikanusha Aya za Qur'ani tulizo mteremshia Muhammad, hao watakuta adhabu ya madhila na fedheha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā fa-ulāika lahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
